title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.

OB: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

EB: Change the display type to Combo Box.

Expected result: The default value is set as 'aaa'. After completing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result: No default value is set. After completing step 5, the OK button can still be used.
